title: Team Fortress 2 Lan edition 1021 {DZ - Di3alot]
description:
???????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????
         ?                               TF2 Lan edition                               ?
         ???????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????

Team FortressÃ‚Â« 2 (TF2) is the sequel to the game that put class-based, multiplayer team warfare on the map. 
This years most anticipated online action game, TF2 delivers new gametypes, a signature art style powered by 
Valves next generation animation technology, persistent player statistics, and more.

Unlike other class-based games that offer a variety of combat classes only, Team Fortress 2 packs a wild 
variety of classes which provide a broad range of tactical abilities and personalities, and lend themselves 
to a variety of player skills.

Play as the flame-throwing Pyro, the room clearing Heavy, or the Spy, a master of disguises. Other classes 
include: Scout, Sniper, Medic, Engineer, Demoman, or Soldier.

TF2 features the most advanced graphics of any Source-based game released to date and the most exciting 
class-based action ever created.

         ???????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????
         ?                                 Installation                                ?
         ???????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????

Just run the installer, it just takes 15 min to install. After install you can change your name by typing 
"name" and then your new name -> name "di3alot&#039;.
You can connect to Lan servers by typing "connect" followed by the ip and port -> connect 127.0.0.2:2740.
If you running the server type status in your consol to see your ip and port.
Everyone is a admin at first if you dont change the admin pass in your tfcfgbeetlesmoddefault.cfg and 
your autoexec.cfg its set to di3alot so change that first.
To use the admin functions just press f3.
For the server start up pic I used image001.jpg in the tf directory. I included the psd file so u can change 
the text or the whole pic.


         ???????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????
         ?                                   Credits                                   ?
         ???????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????

First of all credits to Valve for making this godlike game. To create this version I used pieces of the psy 
and gamersx releases, rumble bugs menu and beetlefarts admin software.
